description: Enclosure design parameters used in validation

parameters.name: Box volume
parameters.description: Enclosure internal volume (for sealed and ported boxes)

parameters.name: System Q factor
parameters.description: System quality factor at resonance (sealed boxes)

parameters.name: System compliance ratio
parameters.description: Ratio of driver compliance to box compliance (sealed boxes)

parameters.name: Box leakage losses
parameters.description: Box leakage losses factor (5-20 typical, 7 = Hornresp default)

parameters.name: Helical tuning ratio
parameters.description: Ratio of tuning frequency to driver resonance (ported boxes)
